short_summary: reconstruction of a small craft harbour wharf.
description: The reconstruction of a fixed timber wharf with a new drive-on floating concrete wharf accessed by steel pile supported trestles and vehicle ramp at Okeover Small Craft Harbour, Okeover BC, on Federal Crown land.The work shall be completed no later than November 30, 2024.
full_summary:
===============

**Tender Information: Reconstructed Wharf for Small Craft Harbour, Okeover**

**Tender Reference**: WS4399659560
**Solicitation Reference**: WS4399659560
**Tender Closing Date**: February 7, 2024, at 14:00:00

Contracting Entity:
-----------------

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

Scope of Work:
-----------------

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires a contractor to reconstruct a fixed timber wharf with a new drive-on floating concrete wharf, accessible by steel pile supported trestles and a vehicle ramp at Okeover Small Craft Harbour, Okeover, BC. The contract shall be completed by November 30, 2024.

Trade Agreements:
----------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

Procurement Details:
-------------------

* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: Construction
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

Contact Information:
-------------------

Summer (SPAC/PSPC)
 Phone: +1 778-957-8116
 Email: summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

By logging in to your SAP Ariba account, you can access and download the full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments. For technical support, contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk. Updates for this RFP can be found in the event messages board in SAP Ariba.

**Please note that this tender is now expired and is no longer accepting bids.**
